answers.answer: I have it. It's caused me no issues. My hair has actually grown longer and thicker since pregnancy. Go figure...
Both my pregnancies were normal. I did have a miscarriage in between them at 9wks. But I have two healthy boys:)
I have pcos and am 17 weeks :-). I have an 11 year old. Took me that long to conceive again. I am taking Macca which has been very helpful!! I swear by it :-)
I do. My pregnancy is going well 17 wks, but at the beginning of it I was bleeding in two ocasions.  I have a 9 yrs old, and got prengnant after 7 yrs. Hope to see my little one soon.
I have it. I'm 28 weeks along. It's been a easy go. However I have been gestational diabetes since 18 weeks. Anyone who is insulin resistant pcos should be tested early
I am 34 weeks and went into pre term labor at 31 weeks but in still pregnant
I also have it. I am 19 weeks and everything is going very well. My first baby was perfection after trying 6 years to have her and got pregnant the same month we tried with this baby. Good luck.
Thank everyone.  I seem to hear  a lot of negative stories.   It was great hearing positive.
I have it and so far so good:) Im 29 weeks with a strong baby boy:)
I have it and I am on baby #3. All my pregnancies have gone fine. I'm 33 weeks with the 3rd right now. :)
I have it and so far it's going great 24 weeks! First pregnancy and took us 2.5 years to conceive. At first I was on meds but now I'm not on any and am very grateful :)
Polycystic ovarian syndrome. Ovaries tend to be oversized and full of cysts, causes difficulty conceiving. Also can cause insulin resistance and horomone imbalances.

I haven't and I'm at 10 weeks and with a high risk pregnancy I'm praying for the best.. my progesterone is low but I'm sure if you had any complications your doctor would have made you well aware.. don't go looking for things to worry about if you don't have to good luck best wishes

question: Just wondering if anyone else has PCOS.  If so how is your pregnancy going?
title: pcos
